%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\begin{longtable}{|||l|c|r|||c|c|c||||}
\caption{caption of the table}
\endfirsthead
\noalign{\vskip0.16\textheight}
